short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that automatically refreshes a tab on a fully customizable interval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Auto Refresher - Free, Simple, and Open Source Chrome Extension

Elevate your browsing experience with Custom Auto Refresher, the ultimate solution for automatic tab refreshing. This powerful yet simple Chrome extension allows you to set fully customizable intervals for automatic page refreshes. Whether you need your tabs to refresh every few seconds or once every few hours, Custom Auto Refresher has you covered.

Key Features:
- Highly Customizable Intervals: Set the refresh interval to any value in seconds, including decimal points for precise control. Customize the refresh rate to perfectly suit your needs, whether it's for real-time data monitoring, online auctions, or stock market updates.
- Reliable and Sequential Refreshing: Unlike other extensions, Custom Auto Refresher ensures each refresh completes fully before initiating the next one. This guarantees seamless performance and prevents any overlap or missed refreshes.
- Open Source and Free: Enjoy the benefits of a free tool with the transparency and security of open-source software. Inspect, modify, and contribute to the codebase to tailor the extension to your specific requirements.

Custom Auto Refresher stands out with its simplicity, efficiency, and customization capabilities. Perfect for anyone from professionals needing constant updates to casual users wanting automatic page reloads, this extension enhances your web browsing experience effortlessly.

Download Custom Auto Refresher today and experience the ultimate in customizable, automatic tab refreshing for Chrome!
